15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Whoever frees a portion" or, he said: "a part" or he said: "a share he owns of a slave, then he can afford the remainder of the price according to the reasonable price, then he will be free. Otherwise he has freed as much as he has freed (only)." Ayyub (one of the narrators) said: "Perhaps Nafi said in this Hadith: 'Meaning he has freed as much of him as he has freed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْعَبْدِ يَكُونُ بَيْنَ الرَّجُلَيْنِ فَيُعْتِقُ أَحَدُهُمَا نَصِيبَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Slave Owned By Two Men And One Of Them Frees His Portion Of Him
